#summary How to deploy MaxTable servers on a cluster.

==Defining Machine Configuration for MaxTable==
  * Configure for the client
{{{
metaserver=192.168.171.152
metaport=1959
}}}
  * Configure for the Master server
{{{
port=1959
}}}
  * Configure for the Ranger server
{{{
metaserver=192.168.171.152
metaport=1959
rangerserver=192.168.171.153
rangerport=1949
}}}
